name: Network Security Virtualization Platform
short_description:
Calling the developers around the world who are interested to start Open Source Network Security Virtualization Platform. 

The concept is as written below:
1.Build the Scalable, Secure,Robust Network Security Virtualization Platform Hypervisor.
2. Elastic and flexible. It is is able to customize CPU, RAM, network and local storage on servers - up and down, on the fly.
3.It can clone virtual firewall, virtual IPS etc to create 'customer images' which can be used to deploy copies of a server configuration
4.IAble to Import and Export server images, allowing you to transfer virtual machines to and from your own infrastructure
5.Fully scalable, host many network security solutions in a virtualized environment without sacrificing the performance.
6.It has centralized management console.
7.It is only used to host virtual network security solutions such as firewall, IPS,Antivirus etc.
8. Support load balancing, load sharing, high availability and high performance cluster
summary: Open Source Network Security Virtualization Platform
